ContentType.name: PublicRegistrationConfig
ContentType.Description: Stores all configuration settings of the public registration portlet.

Field.name: SecurityGroups
Field.Description: Security groups

Field.name: DefaultDomainPath
Field.Description: Default domain path where the registered user is created.

Field.name: UserTypeName
Field.Description: Contentype name of the user type, which is inherited from the User contenttype.

Field.name: DuplicateErrorMessage
Field.Description: This text is displayed to the end user, when he or she tries to give a username which is in use.

Field.name: IsBodyHtml
Field.Description: This setting tells that, the email which is sent by the PublicRegistration portlet is configured to use html in the mail body.

Field.name: ActivationEnabled
Field.Description: Turn on/off activation process. If it is turned off, the PublicRegistration portlet will not send an activation email with activation link.

Field.name: ActivationEmailTemplate
Field.Description: The text of the body of the activation email which will be sent to the user. {0} formatting setting will hold the constructed activation link.

Field.name: ActivationSuccessTemplate
Field.Description: This text will be diplayed, after the end user activation process is successfull.

Field.name: AlreadyActivatedMessage
Field.Description: AlreadyActivatedMessage

Field.name: MailSubjectTemplate
Field.Description: Subject text of the activation email will be sent to the end user.

Field.name: MailFrom
Field.Description: MailFrom

Field.name: AdminEmailAddress
Field.Description: AdminEmailAddress

Field.name: RegistrationSuccessTemplate
Field.Description: This text is displayed to the end user, when the registration process is successful.

Field.name: ResetPasswordTemplate
Field.Description: This text is sent to the end user via email during resetting password.

Field.name: ResetPasswordSubjectTemplate
Field.Description: The subject text of the email which is sent to the end user during resetting password.

Field.name: ResetPasswordSuccessfulTemplate
Field.Description: ResetPasswordSuccessfulTemplate

Field.name: ChangePasswordUserInterfacePath
Field.Description: Repository path of the user interface (user control) which is displayen, when the user wants to change his/her password.

Field.name: ChangePasswordSuccessfulMessage
Field.Description: ChangePasswordSuccessfulMessage

Field.name: ForgottenPasswordUserInterfacePath
Field.Description: Repository path of the user interface (usercontrol) which will be displayed, when the user forgets his/her password.

Field.name: NewRegistrationContentView
Field.Description: Repository path of the new contentview. If it's not set, the default InlineNew is used.

Field.name: EditProfileContentView
Field.Description: Repository path of the edit profile contentview (if it is not given, the default InlineEdit is used.)

Field.name: AutoGeneratePassword
Field.Description: NOT WORKING!

Field.name: DisableCreatedUser
Field.Description: DisableCreatedUser

Field.name: IsUniqueEmail
Field.Description: UniqueEmail

Field.name: AutomaticLogon
Field.Description: AutomaticLogon

Field.name: ChangePasswordPagePath
Field.Description: Repository path of the page that contains the public registration protlet with Registration mode.

Field.name: ChangePasswordRestrictedText
Field.Description: This text is displayed when a user tries to view the "change password" page and he/she is not logged in, OR the user has changed his/her password but is still trying to reset the password with the link sent by email

Field.name: AlreadyRegisteredUserMessage
Field.Description: AlreadyRegisteredUserMessage

Field.name: UpdateProfileSuccessTemplate
Field.Description: UpdateProfileSuccessTemplate

Field.name: EmailNotValid
Field.Description: EmailNotValid

Field.name: NoEmailGiven
Field.Description: NoEmailGiven

Field.name: ActivateByAdmin
Field.Description: If set, the user registration will be approved by admin.

Field.name: ActivateEmailSubject
Field.Description: ActivateEmailSubject

Field.name: ActivateEmailTemplate
Field.Description: ActivateEmailTemplate

Field.name: ActivateAdmins
Field.Description: The list of administrators who can approve request of registrations.
